Mushoku Tensei Season 2 Part 2: See details about premiere, plot, trailer, where to watch, cast and crew

In the realm of anime, 'Mushoku Tensei: Jobless Reincarnation' shines as a standout isekai series, creatively embracing familiar tropes. Premiering on April 7, 2024, Season 2 Part 2 promises 12 captivating episodes, continuing Rudeus Greyrat's thrilling journey. Catch it on Crunchyroll and Hulu.

'Pirates of the Caribbean' Producer Jerry Bruckheimer started the controversy by announcing that Johnny Depp, who starred as Captain Jack Sparrow in all five previous Pirates of the Caribbean entries, wasn't on board for a sixth film.

27 Mar, 2024, 11:00 AM IST

The Dangers In My Heart Season 2: Here’s all about plot, cast, how to watch and more

The Dangers In My Heart Season 2 follows the complex romance between middle-schoolers Anna and Kyotaro. With its honest portrayal of teenage life, the anime tackles issues like social anxiety. Season 2 picks up from where the first season left off, promising more drama and heartwarming moments.

27 Feb, 2024, 01:48 AM IST

Filmmaker Rajkumar Santoshi gets 2 years jail in cheque return case; asked to pay Rs 2 cr to complainant

Renowned filmmaker Rajkumar Santoshi was sentenced to two years in jail and ordered to pay Rs 2 crore to a complainant in a cheque return case by a court in Jamnagar, Gujarat. The court granted Santoshi a 30-day stay on the order to appeal in a higher court. The case stemmed from an industrialist named Ashok Lal lending Rs 1 crore to Santoshi for film production, against which Santoshi issued 10 cheques of Rs 10 lakh each.

17 Feb, 2024, 08:56 PM IST

The Dangers In My Heart Season 2: See release date, plot, cast, how to watch, trailer and more

The Dangers In My Heart Season 2, a sequel to the middle-school romance anime, is now available on Amazon Prime Video, offering fans more insights into Kyotaro and Anna's evolving relationship.

24 Jan, 2024, 01:43 AM IST

Two persons from Punjab detained for trying to enter Salman Khan's farmhouse; case registered

Two men were detained for allegedly trying to enter the farmhouse of film actor Salman Khan in Panvel in neighbouring Raigad district and later allowed to go after questioning, a Navi Mumbai police official said on Monday. The incident took place on January 4 in the farmhouse situated in Waze village, he added.

08 Jan, 2024, 10:06 PM IST

Thanks for the info, hush with the source

The New York Times is suing OpenAI and Microsoft for feeding their generative AI models, but the question arises about the fate of news that is not fit for print. The newspaper may win the case, but it's possible that AI models could modify language learning models without a paper trail. As there's no original or new information, acknowledgment is crucial in information-sharing. While purists argue for quality legwork, the real world shows people care about what they are told.

28 Dec, 2023, 11:17 PM IST

Denzel Washington's Hannibal on Netflix: Know about the expected release window

Denzel Washington and Netflix have joined hands for a period drama Hannibal. The film is still in the script-writing stage and other star casts have not been revealed by the makers. Denzel is sure to leave a mark on the audience once it is released.

15 Nov, 2023, 09:52 PM IST

Cuss-words usage on OTT goes down. Do producers intend to attract a wider audience?

Over the last four months, 160 hours of content across eight popular web series had been sampled and it was found that six of them had anywhere between 8% and 68% drop in the use of swear words in their latest seasons.
